Instruction: Combine flour, oil, yeast, sugar, salt, and warm water in the bread machine according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Choose the White Bread setting on the bread machine and start the cycle.
When the dough completes one rise cycle and begins the second kneading cycle, turn off the machine. Restart the White Bread Cycle and allow it to finish the full cycle.
Take out the loaf from the bread machine once the cycle has finished.
